item.title: Summer Reading : Mathematics for Machine Learning
item.description: This summer I will be reading the book Mathematics for Machine Learning, by marc Peter Deisenroth, A. Aldo Faisal, and Cheng Soon Ong. As one reviewer stated ‘This book provdides great coverage of allthe basic mathematical concepts for machine learning.’. The book has 12 chapters, and my goal is to read one chapter each week.
